chunk:
Be Green Bath & Body Rosehip Regenerative Serum

Brand: Be Green Bath & Body

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment
book: 0558-Be Green Bath & Body Rosehip Regenerative Serum

chunk: Ingredients: Rosa Mosqueta (rosehip) oil, olea europaea (olive) oil infused with calendula officinalis (calendula), simmondsia chinesis (jojoba) oil, tocopherol, helichrysum italicum (helichrysum) oil, botswellia carterii (frankincense) oil, lavendula angusifolia (lavender) oil, commiphora myrrha (myrrh) oil
book: 0558-Be Green Bath & Body Rosehip Regenerative Serum

chunk:
Directions: Place 2 drops on finger and massage gently into skin. For best results use 2-3 times daily. Do not use on open wounds. Allow wound to heal before using.

Warnings: 0
book: 0558-Be Green Bath & Body Rosehip Regenerative Serum
